title: Module Parameters: session_enhancer_slap2
description: Post-acquisition enhancement for SLAP2 sessions. Adds standardized session metadata such as FOV location, magnification, and session type to downstream metadata products.

session_type.description: Whether this session is a parent (primary) or a branch (child/follow-up) session.

targeted_structure.description: Brain structure targeted by the experiment (free-text).

fov_scale_factor.description: Scale factor applied to convert coordinates/pixels to physical units (module-specific).
